summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MASAL SEPETÄ° V2 Turkish children's story platform. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend mostly working with one admin integration issue.

minor_issues.issue: Response contains 'topic_name' field but validation expects 'topic' field
minor_issues.impact: Minor - story generation works but field naming inconsistency

integration_issues.issue: Admin login API works but frontend doesn't redirect to dashboard after successful login

passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints working correctly
User registration with name, surname, email, phone, password
User login with email and password authentication
GET /auth/me returns current user info with 10 credits
Admin API login with admin/masallardiyariai credentials
Admin stats API returns dashboard data
Credit balance and credit request APIs functional
Homepage responsive navbar with all required elements
Login page with email, password, Google login button
Register page with all required form fields
About page loads with mission and contact information
End-to-end user registration and login flow
New users receive 10 credits on signup
AI story generation with Turkish TTS audio
Security validation for invalid login attempts
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin login frontend integration - API works correctly but frontend doesn't redirect to dashboard after successful login. Check AuthContext and AdminLoginPage navigation logic.
